questions.question: Year provider started offering managed platform
Number of clients on platform
questions.data_type: Palo has over 5,000 on these platforms

questions.question: Do you hold direct contracts with the circuit providers, or do you leverage an aggregator?
Do you actively monitor and proactively open tickets for circuit issues
What is your SLA for onsite replacement
questions.data_type: Follows OEM hardware warranty.  Typically NBD

questions.question: What is your SLA for P1 incident response
Do you provide an uptime SLA if both hardware and circuits are procured through you? What is the SLA?
questions.data_type: CBTS will negotiate an uptime SLA if all hardware and circuits are procurred through CBTS with an approved design.

questions.question: Throughput monitoring
questions.data_type: Yes, with optional custom CBTS API integration

questions.question: Do you support full mesh? If so, what is the maximum number of sites in a full mesh?
questions.data_type: Yes. Palo's new  Brand Gateway Architecture can now support thousands of location across a global deployment.

questions.question: How do you connect into AWS and Azure?
questions.data_type: Virtual SD-WAN instances or VPN into Palo Prisma or Cloudblades for AWS. Design depends on customer and application needs.

questions.question: How do you license HA?
questions.data_type: Hardware and Licensing is 2x.  Management and support is per site (1X)

questions.question: How can you optimize traffic to each of the below SaaS platforms?
O365/Teams
questions.data_type: Palo SD-WAN supports Application Aware Traffic Steering and Dynamic path Selection to monitor and steer customer specfic applications.

questions.question: ITM - NCR Cloud
questions.data_type: Palo SD-WAN supports Application Aware Traffic Steering and Dynamic path Selection to monitor and steer customer specfic applications.

questions.question: ServiceNow
questions.data_type: Palo offers their Cloudblades integration for automatic ticketing.  CBTS is a ServiceNow shop as well and offers custom customer to CBTS ServiceNow integration.

questions.question: Axiom Accounting
questions.data_type: Palo SD-WAN supports Application Aware Traffic Steering and Dynamic path Selection to monitor and steer customer specfic applications.

questions.question: Jack Henry Cloud -
questions.data_type: Palo SD-WAN supports Application Aware Traffic Steering and Dynamic path Selection to monitor and steer customer specfic applications.
